verses.t: And{G2532} there came{G2064} one{G1520} of{G1537} the seven{G2033} angels{G32} which had{G2192} the seven{G2033} vials{G5357}, and{G2532} talked{G2980} with{G3326} me{G1700}, saying{G3004} unto me{G3427}, Come hither{G1204}; I will shew{G1166} unto thee{G4671} the judgment{G3588} of the great{G3173} whore{G3588} that sitteth{G2521} upon{G1909} many{G4183} waters{G3588}:

With{G3326} whom{G3739} the kings{G3588} of the earth{G3588} have committed fornication{G4203}, and{G2532} the inhabitants{G2730} of the earth{G3588} have been made drunk{G3184} with{G1537} the wine{G3588} of her{G846} fornication{G3588}.

So{G2532} he carried{G667} me{G3165} away in{G1722} the spirit{G4151} into{G1519} the wilderness{G2048}: and{G2532} I saw{G1492} a woman{G1135} sit{G2521} upon{G1909} a scarlet coloured{G2847} beast{G2342}, full{G1073} of names{G3686} of blasphemy{G988}, having{G2192} seven{G2033} heads{G2776} and{G2532} ten{G1176} horns{G2768}.

And{G2532} the woman{G3588} was arrayed in{G4016} purple{G4209} and{G2532} scarlet colour{G2847}, and{G2532} decked{G5558} with gold{G5557} and{G2532} precious{G5093} stones{G3037} and{G2532} pearls{G3135}, having{G2192} a golden{G5552} cup{G4221} in{G1722} her{G846} hand{G3588} full{G1073} of abominations{G946} and{G2532} filthiness{G168} of her{G846} fornication{G4202}:

And{G2532} upon{G1909} her{G846} forehead{G3588} was a name{G3686} written{G1125}, MYSTERY{G3466}, BABYLON{G897} THE GREAT{G3173}, THE MOTHER{G3588} OF HARLOTS{G3588} AND{G2532} ABOMINATIONS{G3588} OF THE EARTH{G3588}.

And{G2532} I saw{G1492} the woman{G3588} drunken{G3184} with{G1537} the blood{G3588} of the saints{G40}, and{G2532} with{G1537} the blood{G3588} of the martyrs{G3588} of Jesus{G2424}: and{G2532} when I saw{G1492} her{G846}, I wondered{G2296} with great{G3173} admiration{G2295}.

And{G2532} the angel{G3588} said unto{G2036} me{G3427}, Wherefore{G1223} didst thou marvel{G2296}? I{G1473} will tell{G2046} thee{G4671} the mystery{G3588} of the woman{G3588}, and{G2532} of the beast{G3588} that carrieth{G941} her{G846}, which{G5101} hath{G2192} the seven{G2033} heads{G2776} and{G2532} ten{G1176} horns{G2768}.

The beast{G3739} that{G1492} thou sawest{G2258} was{G2532}, and{G3756} is{G2532} not{G2076}; and{G3195} shall{G305} ascend{G1537} out of{G3588} the bottomless pit{G2532}, and{G1519} go{G2532} into{G684} perdition{G5217}: and{G2296} they that{G2730} dwell{G1909} on{G3588} the earth{G3739} shall wonder{G3588}, whose{G3756} names{G1909} were{G3588} not{G1125} written{G3588} in{G3588} the book{G3588} of life{G575} from{G2602} the foundation{G2889} of the world{G991}, when they behold{G3588} the beast{G3739} that{G5100} was{G2532}, and{G3756} is{G2539} not{G2076}, and yet{G2076} is{G2076}.
And here{G5602} is the mind{G3588} which hath{G2192} wisdom{G4678}. The seven{G2033} heads{G2776} are{G1526} seven{G2033} mountains{G3735}, on{G1909} which{G846} the woman{G3588} sitteth{G2521}.

And{G2532} there are{G1526} seven{G2033} kings{G935}: five{G4002} are fallen{G4098}, and{G2532} one{G1520} is{G2076}, and the other{G243} is not yet{G3768} come{G2064}; and{G2532} when{G3752} he{G846} cometh{G2064}, he must{G1163} continue{G3306} a short space{G3641}.

And{G2532} the beast{G3588} that{G3739} was{G2258}, and{G2532} is{G2076} not{G3756}, even{G2532} he{G846} is{G2076} the eighth{G3590}, and{G2532} is{G2076} of{G1537} the seven{G2033}, and{G2532} goeth{G5217} into{G1519} perdition{G684}.

And{G2532} the ten{G1176} horns{G2768} which{G3739} thou sawest{G1492} are{G1526} ten{G1176} kings{G935}, which{G3748} have received{G2983} no{G3768} kingdom{G932} as yet{G3768}; but{G235} receive{G2983} power{G1849} as{G5613} kings{G935} one{G1520} hour{G5610} with{G3326} the beast{G3588}.
These{G3778} have{G2192} one{G1520} mind{G1106}, and{G2532} shall give{G1239} their{G1438} power{G3588} and{G2532} strength{G3588} unto the beast{G3588}.

These{G3778} shall make war{G4170} with{G3326} the Lamb{G3588}, and{G2532} the Lamb{G3588} shall overcome{G3528} them{G846}: for{G3754} he is{G2076} Lord{G2962} of lords{G2962}, and{G2532} King{G935} of kings{G935}: and{G2532} they that are{G3588} with{G3326} him{G846} are called{G2822}, and{G2532} chosen{G1588}, and{G2532} faithful{G4103}.

And{G2532} he saith{G3004} unto me{G3427}, The waters{G3588} which{G3739} thou sawest{G1492}, where{G3757} the whore{G3588} sitteth{G2521}, are{G1526} peoples{G2992}, and{G2532} multitudes{G3793}, and{G2532} nations{G1484}, and{G2532} tongues{G1100}.

And{G2532} the ten{G1176} horns{G2768} which{G3739} thou sawest{G1492} upon{G1909} the beast{G3588}, these{G3778} shall hate{G3404} the whore{G3588}, and{G2532} shall make{G4160} her{G846} desolate{G2049} and{G2532} naked{G1131}, and{G2532} shall eat{G5315} her{G846} flesh{G3588}, and{G2532} burn{G2618} her{G846} with{G1722} fire{G4442}.

For{G1063} God{G2316} hath put{G1325} in{G1519} their{G846} hearts{G3588} to fulfil{G4160} his{G846} will{G3588}, and{G2532} to agree{G4160}, and{G2532} give{G1325} their{G846} kingdom{G3588} unto the beast{G3588}, until{G891} the words{G3588} of God{G3588} shall be fulfilled{G5055}.
And{G2532} the woman{G3588} which{G3739} thou sawest{G1492} is{G2076} that great{G3173} city{G3588}, which{G2192} reigneth{G932} over{G1909} the kings{G3588} of the earth{G3588}.
